/>
XIII.i.3.G.2.b
.
Basing Rating Determinations Under 38 U.S.C. 109(c) on the Evidence
Base rating determinations under
38 U.S.C 109(c)
on the evidence submitted with the request.
The medical facility is responsible for fully developing the claim before sending the request directly to Medical Administration Service (MAS) (136) in the Wilmington VAMROC.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section G - Eligibility for Medical Services for Polish and Czechoslovakian Armed Forces
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section G
